activities: The company provides services using its proprietary software to process information regarding blood glucose measurements by personal measuring devices used by individuals and provide reports, aggregations and analysis of that data.  The data received by the may include the personal information of individuals whose blood glucose levels have been measured.  The company provides these services to medical providers relating to their patients and to clinical research organizations relating to their subjects in clinical trials.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Clinical trial data and personal identification and related blood glucose measurements.
